title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Feb 8 2022
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Feb 8 2022
description:
Has the left suddenly seen the light on what Clay and Buck have said all along? A fired-up mom on going viral over the mask mandates in schools. Author Erich Schwartzel on Hollywood's relationship with China. Rebel News Journalist Adam Soos on the frontlines of the trucker convoy in Canada.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
